channel.title: How to Kiss Better Blog
channel.description: Expert kissing advice, techniques, and tips from C.J. McKenna

item.title: Types of Kisses and What They Really Mean
item.description: Discover what different types of kisses reveal about your relationship. From forehead kisses to French kisses, learn the hidden language of intimacy.

item.title: Signs You're a Bad Kisser (And How to Fix It)
item.description: Worried you might be a bad kisser? Learn the 7 telltale signs and exactly how to fix each one. No judgment, just solutions.

item.title: First Kiss Nerves Are Normal: Here's What Actually Matters
item.description: Everyone is nervous before a first kiss. Learn how to read the signals, build the moment, and move through the nerves.

item.title: How to Be a Better Kisser: 7 Techniques That Actually Work
item.description: Learn how to be a better kisser with 7 expert techniques. Master the Mirror Technique and create chemistry that lingers.
